subject: Sports Injuries
College Athletics
Workers' Compensation Insurance
Football (College)
Decisions and Verdicts
Organized Labor
lead_paragraph: In 1982 an appeals court declared that as a football player, Fred W. Rensing should be considered an Indiana State employee, but the state’s Supreme Court reversed the ruling the next year.
snippet: In 1982 an appeals court declared that as a football player, Fred W. Rensing should be considered an Indiana State employee, but the state’s Supreme Court reversed the ruling the next year.
